Row.Text: Pass the Might for Right Act

The Might for Right Act is a controversial piece of legislation which would empower your government to draft metahumans into service in times of war. It will cause quite a bit of anger amongst your populace, but that is a preferable alternative to having the strength of your super-powered elite go unused as your forces fight a hopeless battle.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Paragon City [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in the Renaissance Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Upon the outbreak of a war, receive one Gunpowder Unit and an additional Gunpowder Unit for every 5 Cities you control. Thes Units have the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Metahuman Draftees[ENDCOLOR] Promotion, granting them +20% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength. However, each Unit you have with this Promotion increases [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness by 8%.

Establish the Paragon Police Department Awakened Division

The PPD has vowed to bring even the toughest metahuman evildoers to justice with good old-fashioned police work, but they have begun to realize that that ideal is no longer realistic. The Awakened Division is an idea brought up by the Chief of Police. Volunteers for the Division will merge their bodies with that of an alien energy being known as a Kheldian.
